description: The KA-06 RTO handles vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport regulations in the Tumakuru district, emphasizing road safety and efficient services.
additionalInfo: Covers Tumkur Town and Taluk, Kunigal and Gubbi Taluks.

description: The KA-07 RTO serves the Kolar district, focusing on vehicle compliance, license issuance, and transport enforcement.
additionalInfo: Covers Kolar Town and Taluk, Srinivasapura and Mulbagal Taluks.

description: The KA-08 RTO manages transport services in the Kolar Gold Fields area, with emphasis on mining-related vehicle regulations and safety.
additionalInfo: Covers K.G.F. Town, Bangarpet and Malur Taluks.

description: The KA-09 RTO oversees western parts of Mysuru, ensuring smooth vehicle registrations and license processes.
additionalInfo: Covers Western Mysuru City Suburbs, Western parts of Mysuru Taluk and Nanjangud Taluk.

description: The KA-10 RTO is dedicated to the entire Chamarajanagar district, promoting road safety and efficient transport administration.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Chamarajanagar District.

description: The KA-11 RTO facilitates vehicle-related services in Mandya, with a focus on agricultural vehicle regulations.
additionalInfo: Covers Mandya Town and Taluk, Malavalli, Maddur, Srirangapatna and Pandavapura Taluks.

description: The KA-12 RTO serves the hilly Kodagu district, emphasizing eco-friendly transport practices.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Kodagu District.

description: The KA-13 RTO manages transport in Hassan, supporting tourism and local mobility.
additionalInfo: Covers Hassan Town and Taluk, Arasikere, Holenarasipura, Channarayapatna and Arakalgud Taluks.

description: The KA-14 RTO handles services in Shivamogga, focusing on riverine and forested areas.
additionalInfo: Covers Shivamogga Town and Taluk, Bhadravathi and Tirthahalli Taluks.

description: The KA-15 RTO serves the Sagara region, ensuring compliance in rural transport.
additionalInfo: Covers Sagara Town and Taluk, Soraba, Shikaripura, and Hosanagar Taluks.

description: The KA-16 RTO covers the entire Chitradurga district, promoting safe and regulated transport.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Chitradurga District.

description: The KA-17 RTO administers vehicle services across Davanagere district.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Davanagere District.

description: The KA-18 RTO focuses on the coffee-rich Chikkamagaluru district.
additionalInfo: Covers Chikkamagaluru, Mudigere, Sringeri as well as parts of Narsimharaja and Koppa Taluks.

description: The KA-19 RTO serves the coastal Mangaluru city and taluk.
additionalInfo: Covers Mangaluru City and Taluk.

description: The KA-20 RTO covers the entire Udupi district, known for temples and beaches.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Udupi District.

description: The KA-21 RTO manages services in Puttur and surrounding taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Puttur and Sullia Taluks.

description: The KA-22 RTO serves Belagavi town and nearby areas.
additionalInfo: Covers Belgaum Town and Taluk and Khanapur Taluk.

description: The KA-23 RTO covers Chikkodi and parts of neighboring taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Chikkodi, and parts of Hukkeri and Raibag Taluks.

description: The KA-24 RTO handles transport in Bailhongal region.
additionalInfo: Covers Bailhongal, Kittur and parts of Saundatti Taluk.

description: The KA-25 RTO serves northern suburbs of Hubli-Dharwad.
additionalInfo: Covers Northern suburbs of Hubli-Dharwad City, Dharwad and parts of Navalgund and Kalghatgi Taluks.

description: The KA-26 RTO covers the entire Gadag district.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Gadag District.

description: The KA-27 RTO manages services in Haveri town and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Haveri Town and Taluk, Hanagal, Shiggaon and Savanoor.

description: The KA-28 RTO serves the entire Vijayapura district.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Vijayapura District.

description: The KA-29 RTO covers Bagalkote town and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Bagalkot Town and Taluk, Hunagund, Bilagi and Badami Taluks.

description: The KA-30 RTO serves coastal Karwar and nearby areas.
additionalInfo: Covers Karwar Town and Taluk, Ankola and parts of Supa Taluks.

description: The KA-31 RTO manages transport in Sirsi and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Sirsi, Siddapura, Yellapura, and Mundagod Taluks.

description: The KA-32 RTO covers the entire Kalaburagi district.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Kalaburagi District.

description: The KA-33 RTO serves the entire Yadgir district.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Yadgir District.

description: The KA-34 RTO manages the entire Ballari district.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Ballari District.

description: The KA-35 RTO covers the entire Vijayanagara district.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Vijayanagara District.

description: The KA-36 RTO serves the entire Raichur district.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Raichur District.

description: The KA-37 RTO covers the entire Koppal district.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Koppal District.

description: The KA-38 RTO serves Bidar town and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Bidar Town and Taluk, as well as Aurad Taluk.

description: The KA-39 RTO manages Bhalki and nearby taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Bhalki and Humnabad Taluks.

description: The KA-40 RTO covers Chikkaballapura town and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Chikkaballapura Town and Taluk, Gauribidanur, Gudibande and parts of Sidlaghatta and Bagepalli Taluks.

description: The KA-41 RTO serves western suburbs of Bengaluru.
additionalInfo: Covers Greater Bengaluru's western suburbs.

description: The KA-42 RTO covers the entire Ramanagara district.
additionalInfo: Covers entire Ramanagara District.

description: The KA-43 RTO serves Devanahalli and nearby taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Devanahalli and Doddaballapura Taluks.

description: The KA-44 RTO manages Tiptur and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Tiptur, Turuvekere and Chikkanayakanahalli Taluks.

description: The KA-45 RTO covers Hunsur and surrounding taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Hunsur, Piriyapatna, H.D. Kote and K.R. Nagar Taluks.

description: The KA-46 RTO serves Sakleshpura and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Sakleshpura, Alur and Belur Taluks.

description: The KA-47 RTO manages coastal Honnavar and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Honnavara, Bhatkal and Kumta Taluks.

description: The KA-48 RTO covers Jamkhandi and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Jamkhandi and Mudhol Taluks.

description: The KA-49 RTO serves Gokak and parts of taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Gokak and parts of Hukkeri Taluk.

description: The KA-50 RTO handles northern suburbs of Bengaluru.
additionalInfo: Covers Greater Bengaluru's northern suburbs.

description: The KA-51 RTO serves southern suburbs of Bengaluru including tech hubs.
additionalInfo: Covers Greater Bengaluru's southern suburbs.

description: The KA-52 RTO covers Nelamangala taluk.
additionalInfo: Covers Nelamangala Taluk.

description: The KA-53 RTO serves eastern suburbs of Bengaluru.
additionalInfo: Covers Greater Bengaluru's eastern suburbs and Hoskote Taluk in Bengaluru Rural District.

description: The KA-54 RTO manages Nagamangala and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Nagamangala & K.R. Pet Taluks.

description: The KA-55 RTO covers eastern suburbs of Mysuru.
additionalInfo: Covers Eastern Mysuru Suburbs, Eastern parts of Mysuru Taluk and T. Narasipura Taluk.

description: The KA-56 RTO serves Basavakalyan taluk.
additionalInfo: Covers Basavakalyana Taluk.

description: The KA-57 RTO is for KSRTC and BMTC buses in Bengaluru.
additionalInfo: Only for 'KA-57 F' series exclusively for KSRTC and BMTC buses. Autorickshaw permits are also available here, although registration has to be done from Bengaluru's other RTOs.

description: The KA-58 RTO serves the Chamrajpet area in Bengaluru.
additionalInfo: Covers Chamrajpet and surrounding areas in Bengaluru.

description: The KA-59 RTO covers Banashankari and Anekal taluk in Bengaluru.
additionalInfo: Covers Anekal Taluk. Suburbs part of the Taluk but under BBMP limits can also avail services from this RTO.

description: The KA-60 RTO serves the RT Nagar area in Bengaluru.
additionalInfo: Covers RT Nagar and surrounding areas in Bengaluru.

description: The KA-61 RTO manages transport in Marathahalli, Bengaluru.
additionalInfo: Covers Marathahalli and eastern parts of Bengaluru.

description: The KA-62 RTO serves the Surathkal area near Mangaluru.
additionalInfo: Covers Surathkal and northern parts of Dakshina Kannada.

description: The KA-63 RTO covers southern suburbs of Hubli-Dharwad.
additionalInfo: Covers Southern suburbs of Hubli-Dharwad City, Hubli, Kundgol and parts of Navalgund and Kalghatgi Taluks.

description: The KA-64 RTO manages Madhugiri and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Madhugiri, Sira, Koratagere and Pavagada Taluks.

description: The KA-65 RTO serves Dandeli and forested taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Dandeli, Supa and Haliyal Taluks.

description: The KA-66 RTO covers Tarikere and parts of taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Tarikere, Kadur as well as parts of Narsimharaja and Koppa Taluks.

description: The KA-67 RTO serves Chintamani and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Chintamani and parts of Sidlaghatta and Bagepalli Taluks.

description: The KA-68 RTO covers Ranebennur town and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Ranebennur Town and Taluk, Hirekerur and Byadagi Taluks.

description: The KA-69 RTO manages Ramdurg and parts of taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Ramdurg and parts of Saundatti Taluks.

description: The KA-70 RTO serves Bantwal and taluks.
additionalInfo: Covers Bantwal and Belthangady Taluks.
